the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Denver Nuggets 108-97 Tuesday night in Allen Iverson 's first game against his former team. It was weird to see him wearing a white jersey and we're wearing Kobe Bryant ," Kyle Korver said. I said to one of our coaches that it is so weird to see him on the other side. It wasn't really a good feeling at all. He's a great player and he meant a lot to Philadelphia. Allen Iverson scored 30 points on 10-of-24 shooting before getting tossed for his second technical with 1:44 remaining.
